sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import styled from 'styled-components'; const Styled = styled.div``; const PersonFacts = ({ data }) => { return (

Personal Info

Know For

{data.known_for_department}

Gender

{data.gender === 1 ? 'Female' : 'Male'}

Know Credits

{parseInt(data.combined_credits.cast.lenght - 1) + parseInt(data.combined_credits.crew.lenght - 1)}

Birthday

{data}

Place of Birth

{data}

Official Site

{data}

Also Know As

{data}
); }; export default PersonFacts;
